entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of freezing drizzle. Temperature rising to zero this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Temperature rising to zero this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 6:44 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
